snippet.title: Beacon [Walkthrough]
snippet.description:
Beacon is a free platformer created by Chevy Ray Johnston.
Link to the game: http://www.indiegames.com/2009/08/freeware_game_pick_beacon_chev.html
  
---
[Walkthrough]
I'm familiar with the game and try to give as much advice as possible. I can't promise to find everything. This is supposed to be a helpful guide through the game and not a 100% run.
